name: Lola
health: Vaccinations up to date, spayed / neutered.
about: Sweet and playful puppy Lola should stay 15 pounds or less. Ready for her forever hom

name: Rambo
health: Vaccinations up to date, spayed / neutered
about: Rambo is an approximately 6 to 7 year old, 41 lb mix of poodle/ cocker spaniel (mom) and husky/ poodle (dad). We also believe he has some Petit Basset Griffon Vendeen AKA pbgv. Rambo has lived as an outside dog his entire life and deserves to finally be part of a family. He is extremely sweet and confident and does well with other medium to large dogs. He would love an active household with at least one other medium to large dog. Please be aware that Rambo is not a small dog and is 41 lbs

name: Golden

name: Brewster
about: Brewster is a male 4-5 month old pug mix.... either puggle (pug /beagle) or chug (pug/chihuahua). He will likely mature at the 20 lb range. Brewster is a very timid boy, he gets scared easily of new places and new people and does not always react well when he is fearful.

name: Jackson
about: sweet, snuggly, affectionate, good boy, active

name: Posh
about: Posh is a lovely 3 year old Lab mix. Posh was living on the street in Mexicali and become pregnant and had her 9 babies, they had no shelter from the cold, and slept on the dirt. She is a very sweet and amazing girl. She would love to go on long walks and hikes. Now that her babies are all adopted she is looking for her forever home.

name: Posh Litter
about: Posh Litter is a lovely 8 weeks old Lab mix. These three are females. They are a super playful puppies that love to explore whatâ€™s around them. They want a home that will spoil and love them. They want to be in a home that continues there socialization. They want a home that will provide them with a life of mental and physical stimulation while keeping them safe. They are now ready for there forever home.

name: Dingo
about: Meet Dingo, another of our most recent puppy rescues! He appears to be a medium-size Terrier mix and is just a little over 2 months old. We've been getting to know him and we find that this little lap-loving scamp likes to play hard and to sleep hard.
